Summary: Object hovering above Denver International Airport
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a shiny object in the sky above Denver International Airport. It was stationary for approximately 10 seconds. I blinked my eyes and looked again and it had an oval appearance, when I looked up again it completely disappeared. I was driving to DIA at the time of this sighting and was about one mile away on Pena Blvd. I know it was not an airplane or a helicopter. I was very excited to see such an unusual object. It was a clear blue sky as well. Thank you,
trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around March 3rd 2008
